thread.title: Yahoo daily fantasy sports gains on big rivals DraftKings, FanDuel
thread.title_full: Yahoo daily fantasy sports gains on big rivals DraftKings, FanDuel - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Benny Evangelista
title: Yahoo daily fantasy sports gains on big rivals DraftKings, FanDuel
text:
Photo: Eric Risberg, Associated Press Experts say Yahoo could now rise to the top of the field because the Sunnyvale company has a long-established brand name and already dominates the overall fantasy sports market. Experts say Yahoo could now rise to the top of the field because...
DraftKings and FanDuel have spent more than $300 million trying to outshout each other in ad campaigns, but there’s another daily fantasy sports competitor that could quietly overtake them: Yahoo. Experts say Yahoo could now rise to the top of the field because the Sunnyvale company has a long-established brand name and already dominates the overall fantasy sports market. Experts say Yahoo could now rise to the top of the field because...
DraftKings and FanDuel have spent more than $300 million trying to outshout each other in ad campaigns, but there’s another daily fantasy sports competitor that could quietly overtake them: Yahoo.
